title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Oct 24 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Oct 24 2022
description:
Self-described "election nerd" Clay goes over the latest polls and political betting markets, which are looking better and better for GOP chances to flip the Senate. Nancy Pelosi says inflation is a distraction, Biden wants to spend more money on climate change. Trump says Dems have gone communist. School shutdowns, not covid, lowered test scores. CDC Director Walensky gets covid right after her latest booster. Arizona Senate candidate Blake Masters joins Clay and Buck to explain why he's surging in Arizona for Senate.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
